Package Controllers

Class Main

java.lang.Object
Controllers.Main
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class Main extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Main Controller for main view Error in while loop in fillWIthData. Attempted to fill observable list with customer objects instead of string values which gave issues with lambda expression on line 52.
